summary: One more round with the Thalmor
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i1161.photobucket.com/albums/q515/Dfac364/RRShackCovershot.jpg[/IMG]

======================
Legend of the Lost Sword v 1.0  
by: Dfac364
======================
The Aldmer god Syrabane once again attempts to enter the world of nirn so that he can lay slaughter to any who would refuse to worship him.  His champion is chosen and 
so to must we choose a champion, a warrior of great inner strength to forge and wield the mighty North Sword on the behalf of all men, just as in the days of old, for if 
Syrabane and the Thalmor succeed than the fate of all man kind will be sealed.

                                       [color=red]:::::ATTENTION:::::
The error that was preventing quest progression has been fixed please download the final patch and enjoy :)[/color]

======================
Description
======================
Ever feel like you got cheated out of really sticking it to the Thalmor?  Well heres a chance to foil their plans once again and add 
savior of mankind to your list of titles and accolades.

Note: In order to start the Quest you must speak to the Rambling Lunatic sitting next to the roadsign outside of Whiterun

Includes: 
-One player friendly shack in the woods
-One player friendly bandit hideout near the road
-Characters with dialogue leading you down a treacherous storyline
-Lore friendly backstory
-One minor god realm
-One chance to thwart the Thalmor
-One balanced and unique sword (does extra damage to elves)
-New book titled Syrabane Crises
-Two journals to aid in explaining the back story


[youtube]gTttAFDMsXs[/youtube]

======================
Installation Instructions
======================
Simply unzip and place all files (Except README) into Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/data

======================
My other even better mods! 
======================

-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17569]Militarize Solitude[/url]

-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21444/?tab=4&navtag=/ajax/comments/?thread_id=744394|:|mod_id=21444]Burleigh and Stronginthearm[/url]


======================
Credit Where Credit is Due
======================

A big thanks to everyone who posts on the Nexus forums especially DeadlyCobraXXX and fg109 and everyone else who has answered my constant questions
and another big thanks to everyone who has put up a tutorial in regards to anything modding, especially video tutorials
author: Dfac364
